entry.title: PyCascades 2025 Proposal Review Process
entry.summary:
Description

In this video, our 2025 Program Chair share details about the proposal review process and walks through an example of how NOT to write a proposal. If you are interesting in volunteering to be a reviewer, please email program@pycascades.com. To receive mentoring or to volunteer as a â€¦
entry.content:
Description

In this video, our 2025 Program Chair share details about the proposal review process and walks through an example of how NOT to write a proposal. If you are interesting in volunteering to be a reviewer, please email program@pycascades.com. To receive mentoring or to volunteer as a mentor for potential speakers, please email speaker-support@pycascades.com. The corresponding blog post for this video can be found at https://2025.pycascades.com/news/cfp-review/.
